- display day and date
- indicate battery level and charging state
- vibrate and alternate bottom bar border when bluetooth disconnects

This watchface sips power. I'm getting over a week with it.

data.author: Jalaleddin Omari

data.author: Allezxandre

changelog.release_notes:
Little bugfixes

Corrections mineures de bugs

New night torch! I like the Pebble's soft lighting at night, so at night, the screen backlight behaves differently: it turns on for 45 seconds when you shake your wrist. You can turn it back off by shaking your wrist a second time!

Nouveau : lampe de nuit ! La nuit, j'aime le rétro éclairage de la Pebble pour voir autour. Ainsi, la nuit, le rétro-éclairage a un comportement différent : il reste allumé pendant 45 secondes après avoir été activé par secousse. Pour l'éteindre, il suffit de secouer de nouveau le poignet

Brand new font! I hate it when fonts remind me that my watch doesn't have a 5K retina display, so I made my own font that is all squared — no more bezels. The screen looks so crispy now!

But that's not all! The watch now saves the weather data, so that you can quit the watch face, do something else (like controlling the music from your phone), and then get back to it without needing to update. Also works when your phone is disconnected! Instead of an ugly "no-phone" icon, you get data from the last time your phone fetched the weather. 

There are other things of course, I hope you enjoy this update!

Français :
  * [Nouveau] Date formatée suivant le langage 
  * [Nouveau] Secouer la montre pour forcer une mise à jour programmée avec 2 secondes de retard
  * [Nouveau] Nouvelles polices de caractères : Ubuntu
  * [Amélioration] Utilisation de batterie encore minimisée, et intervalle de mise à jour de 20 minutes
  Dans la prochaine mise à jour : retour du panneau de configuration

English:
  * [New] Date format respects locale setting
  * [New] Shake to force an update after a 2 seconds delay
  * [New] New font: Ubuntu
  * [Improved] Reduced battery usage, and increased the update interval to 20 minutes
  Up next: bring settings back

If you believe the German or/and the Spanish date format is/are wrong, please contact me.

Mise à jour : la météo ne fonctionnait plus (désolé), c'est réglé. 

J'ai désactivé les paramètres. Ils ne fonctionnaient plus depuis plusieurs mois. J'hésite à les réimplémenter.

Maintenant, l'icône est en fonction du lever/coucher de soleil.

Le site de configuration ne fonctionnait plus, désolé :D 
(Il ne contient que l'option des vibrations, mais c'était quand même embêtant)
Nouveau site de configuration... Si vous avez des bugs, mettez à jour !

data.description:
Now supports - English, French, German and Spanish.

— English
International alternative to Futura Weather by Niknam. The Watchface will display date according to your Pebble's language settings. This version features a lot of improvements over the original watch face, so try it out! 

— Français
Version internationnale de Futura Weather par Niknam. Ce cadran Pebble affichera la date suivant les paramètres de langues définis sur votre montre Pebble.

latest_release.release_notes:
Little bugfixes

Corrections mineures de bugs

data.title: French Weather

data.author: hikoLab
data.description:
This is a simple watch that displays the current time as a barcode. A barcode contains 4 numbers representing time(HHMM). It updates a barcode every minute with an animation.

The barcode's symbology type is NW-7(Codabar). You can read a barcode using a barcode reader such as a smartphone app.

This barcode completely meets Codabar specifications .
data.title: Barcode Watch

data.author: David Gianforte

changelog.release_notes:
Version 1.3
Watchface now stores timezone locally on the watch. (patch by Mitch Patenaude)

data.description: This watchface shows a world map with the current sunlight coverage, along with the time and date. Watch daylight pass across the earth as the day goes by, and see how the sun hits the earth at different times of the year.

data.description:
Global Pebble!

It can make any two timezone clocks in one watchface.

Let you know when is there at a glance, all the world time is just on your wrist!

Download the Companion iOS App From AppStore.

It will help you to make a global time watchface for your Pebble smart watch.

Choose the timezone which you want and click the 'Install'

Support 2.0 Pebble OS.

Enjoy ~

Release 2.1.0

Watchface now has a Bluetooth connection indicator and vibrates on Bluetooth connect and disconnect events.

data.description:
Text Doctors combines an affinity for text watchfaces with an affinity for Doctor Who.

Hours are indicated by the names of the actors who have played the Doctor, with minutes and day of week / day of month / month below. Seconds are indicated by the progress of the tiny TARDIS along the white bar between the time and date.

Yes, the TARDIS is tiny...but remember, it's bigger on the inside.

latest_release.release_notes:
Release 2.1.0

Watchface now has a Bluetooth connection indicator and vibrates on Bluetooth connect and disconnect events.

The configuration webpage has also been modernised.

Timing tweaks and better battery life.

You asked for it: Handwritten is now open sourced!
Help me in my quest against bug squashing.
----------------

A different pen stroke for each hour and minute of the day,
this watchface looks just as if it was scribbled on top of your pebble screen.

Configurable: 
Black or White text

No more boring fonts that all look the same, have a truly unique timepiece!

data.description:
CAS NextEvent displays information about the next event in your CAS Calendar. Shake your Pebble to display a list of upcomming events.

IMPORTANT NOTE: To use the watchface you have to be a CAS customer. If you are not, you can test it with "Robert Glaser" login and manage a test calendar within the CAS demo site at http://demo.cas.de/

data.author: reno
data.description:
Hand-ripped from a Sega Master System game (Wonder Boy III: The Dragon's Trap). Includes day/date/month and a leading zero on the time (12/24). 

Special thanks to Big Time and ice2097's Pix2 watchface. I made this for myself originally, but I thought you guys might like it too.

**UPDATE** Made the date font a lot larger.

Enjoy!

Please note, this watchface relies on the cryptsy API, which is frequently unavailable.  Best effort is made to display the current price.

data.description:
A simple watchface that displays the time, date and moon phase.

For the moon phase, an icon for one of 14 phases of the moon is displayed with a different representation for waxing and waning moons. Moon phases are pre-calculated for the next 10 years.

Based on Moontiles by Brian Holman

That's a very nice watchface you have there.

Includes day/date/month below the time (12hour & 24hour modes). Watch out for the creeper on the zeros. :D  

Special thanks to MineCrafter font by 8Byte Studios, Big Time and ice2097's Pix2 watchface.

Enjoy!

data.author: Jesse Hallett
data.description:
Fuzzy Text watchface with support for six languages. The elegance of the Text Watch with the natural language of Fuzzy Time.

Supported languages:
- English
- French
- German
- Norwegian
- Spanish
- Swedish

Other display options can be adjusted in the settings.

This open source watchface has been produced by the efforts of several people - including Mihai Dumitrache and Mattias Bäcklund.

data.description: This is the pebble default "Just a Bit" watchface modified to use truly binary bits instead of using binary bits to represent base 10 numbers.

data.description:
Shows battery level (%) and -lifetime (days in dots).
The lifetime days are displayed in 7 dots. A white dot is one day of your battery lifetime.

V4: Configurable via Phone settings (vibrate & period). 
V6: Bug fixes & blinking '+' when charging.
V7: Minor bugfixes.

-Gio-

2 selectable battery indicators.
  - Level: Shows 4 levels of battery charge
  - Classic: Battery icon shows shows at 20% or less
2 selectable BT vibration modes

  - Light: 300ms on, 150ms off 300ms On

data.description:
This is a rotolog watch face with time, date, bluetooth, and battery indicator.

The watch will do two strong vibrations indicating bluetooth disconnect. Battery indicator will show as you get to 20% remaining.

Shake your wrist and the face will switch to date mode for 4 seconds.

Please contact me for any questions, concerns or special requests.

  - Level: Shows 4 levels of battery charge
  - Classic: Battery icon shows shows at 20% or less
2 selectable BT vibration modes

  - Light: 300ms on, 150ms off 300ms On

data.author: SetPebble

changelog.release_notes: 2.6 patch for new Pebble Time Android

data.description:
The time rotates to always remain upright based on the watch orientation.

The colors, battery indicator, connection indicator, and vibration are customizable.

Unfortunately the accelerometer drains the battery faster, but it sure is cool to see the watchface stay upright.
data.title: Upright

data.author: SetPebble

changelog.release_notes: 2.7 patch for new Pebble Time Android

data.description:
Tilt complements my Upright watchface.  The Pebble accelerometer is used to display the time with respect to gravity.

Custom settings include colors, battery indicator, connectivity, and date format.
data.title: Tilt

data.author: SetPebble

changelog.release_notes: 3.6 Patch for new Pebble Time Android

data.description:
This watch is an homage to the LED/LCD digital watches of 40 years ago. Numbers and sometimes characters were displayed based on a set series of bars.

The colons between the hours and minutes blink every second (just like in the old watches!). And the numbers are especially big so they can be seen at a glance.

There are custom settings for chooseing colors, date format, battery indicator, etc.
data.title: Digital Watch

data.author: Jack T.

changelog.release_notes: v3.0: Added chalk version for pebble round
v2.0: Added color version for Pebble Time, change the hour hand to an comet, added infinite rotation option
v1.1: Added main Asteorid Belt between Mars and Jupiter, off by default

data.description:
Lean on the Watch of Van Cleef & Arpels: Midnight Planetarium, this WatchFace shows the current state of our Solar System. To deal better with the small resolution, the screen show only a part of the system, rotating around the Sun onse per 12 hour. 
Planet calclations done every hour, Face update every minute. 
Fully configurable: invert, animation, hourly vibrate, show stars, lucky date and infinite rotation. 
Change the original name to Planetarium, as someone very rich is to stupid to accept free promotion. ^^

latest_release.release_notes: v3.0: Added chalk version for pebble round

data.title: Planetarium

data.author: SetPebble
data.description:
Display your Flickr photos on your Pebble. If you have a Flickr account, enter your Flickr screen name on your custom settings page, and all publicly-available images will be shuffled every few minutes onto your Pebble watch.

If you don't have a Flickr account, you will want one so you can put your favorite photos onto your Pebble.  You can see test pictures if you enter "SetPebble" as the Flickr user on the custom settings screen. No space characters are allowed in the screen name.

Your smart phone will get a workout if you set your apps to update every minute.  Frequent image updates will wear down your battery faster, but just throttle back the update interval to an hour and you can go days before recharging.
data.title: Flickery

data.author: DeathBySharept
data.description: Digital clock version of Bliss Time, weather in farenheit along with text description of conditions, battery percentage, 2 week calendar view.
data.title: Bliss Time Digital

data.author: Mitch Patenaude

changelog.release_notes: Slight improvement on how drawing is done, so that there isn't a slight delay before the seconds indicator populates.

data.description: An implementation of the famous Berlin clock.  Misnamed the Mengenlehreuhr, or "set theory clock", it uses a series of blocks to represent the time in 24h format. The circle at the top blinks with the seconds.  The top row of blocks represents 5 hours each, the second row 1 hour each, the third row 5 minutes each, and the fourth row 1 minute each.  The time in the screenshot is 16:27.

latest_release.release_notes: Slight improvement on how drawing is done, so that there isn't a slight delay before the seconds indicator populates.

data.title: Berlin Clock

data.author: garanda

changelog.release_notes:
- Added support for Pebble 2 (Diorite)
- Fixes related with SDK 4

- Fix for weather using GPS 
- Added again option to use GPS to get weather

- Since yahoo close the YQL query, theres no more weather by using GPS, now only can use weather by city name. 
- Removed option 'Yes' for use GPS in weather section.
- Added compatibility with Pebble Time firmware (SDK 3)

- Added setting for vibe on disconnect enable/disable
- Fixed Aplite memory leak

- Fix for Aplite doesn't apply settings (Pebble original)
- Now the date numbers change the font color
- Fix issue when No GPS setting was selected and location services are disabled

- Added half, quarter and three-quarter settings for timezones like Caracas, Norfolk Island, Labrador, Eucla, etc.
just set the minutes in the settings page.

For calculate the time differences you can use this page: http://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/converter.html
- Bigger font size for secondary clock, temperature and battery percentage.

- Fixed secondary clock issue gmt in Pebble Time
- Fixed city name secondary clock issue
- Added setting for change font color in both sections.

- Now for Pebble time in full color
- Chose your favorite color in the settings of watchface
- Bug fixes
- Added setting to show/hide seconds (increase battery life)

- Added a Bluetooth icon for connection/disconnection
- Added current temperature using GPS or City name and condition icon
- Added new language Turkish
- Bug fixes

- Added a usefully secondary clock, you can add this in the watchface settings.

*Note: This is not a time zone clock, just adds or subtract hours from the actual time
Added some cool stuffs like 24 format time and invert colors

data.description:
Great animated pebble face that show the date in a big format, as well the time including seconds in 12h/24h format and the possibility to add a secondary clock (Not timezone, just add or subtract to the actual time).  

Show the current Temperature (Fº or Cº) using GPS or just typing the name of the city you want (powered by Yahoo Weather), and condition icons.

Also have a very usefully animated battery indicator on the right-top of the screen, never get discharge your Pebble again. 

Bluetooth icon for connection/disconnection (vibes on disconnect)

Multilingual clock by settings in the Pebble app of the Phone and more cool stuffs. 

More info: http://youtu.be/rMviK6940d4

latest_release.release_notes:
- Added support for Pebble 2 (Diorite)
- Fixes related with SDK 4

data.title: The Big Date Dual clock

data.author: Bert de Ruiter

changelog.release_notes: Changed weather update function to try and eliminate new weather API restrictions.

Updated to use the new OpenWeatherMap API.
Weather update is now every hour, due to limitations of the new API changes.
Removed leaderboard completely, I cannot afford the hosting for it anymore because there are too many users right now.

Fixed weather not showing.
Fixed temperature not saving.
Added color selection, choose any color you want!
Leaderboard temporary unavailable (it will be back soon)
Stopped bgworker till I fix the SDK 3 bug.
Added fixed locations to avoid using GPS.
Pip Boy 100 color Pebble Time release
Added an option to disable the backgroundworker.

Added a background worker.
Now you also get xp when you're using a different watchface!
Background worker updates once every minute, this should not have a major impact on the battery.
Fixed a bug where the nickname would not be saved.

Added configuration screen to select fahrenheit or celcius.
Temperature now has 1 decimal.

Added leaderboards!
Enter a nickname in the settings menu and compete with other Vault Dwellers for the top!

The leaderboards is currently in an early stage, more to come!

data.description: A Pebble watchface inspired by Fallout’s Pip Boy. - Date (European/US) - Battery charge Middle “VaultBoy” shows bluetooth connection. When the connection changes the Pebble will vibrate. With certain movements you will gain experience points and you can level up! Shake your Pebble to show the weather.

latest_release.release_notes: Changed weather update function to try and eliminate new weather API restrictions.

data.title: Pip Boy 100

data.author: Duendiyo
data.description: The police of the future ...: D
data.title: Robocop v2

changelog.release_notes: 1.4 - Changed font to something a little more pretty

data.description: This text based Watchface shows the time in luxembourgish!

data.author: 8a22a
data.description: The time represented by two trails. The wider inner trail is the hour and the thinner outer trail is the minutes. Imagine a circle at the end of the trail to determine the number position.

data.author: David Cesarino

changelog.release_notes:
- Novo suporte ao Pebble Time e Pebble Time Steel.
- Condições de ondas e ventos do momento.
- Indicação da altura da maré também através de cor (Time e Time Steel).
- Novo visual mais moderno e bem acabado.
- Exigência de Pebble atualizado para versão 3.9 ou superior.
- Exigência de app para Android versão 7.1 ou superior.
Portuguese version, supports firmware 2.0.0. Fixed text layers boundaries when text is taller/wider than the previous boundary.

data.description:
Este programa permite que o seu Pebble mostre dados atualizados de marés, ondas e ventos de vários locais no Brasil, de forma instantânea e intuitiva, com cores que representam a altura da maré, provendo um feedback imediato, e que estão de acordo com os padrões meteorológicos e oceanográficos.

Instale agora e não se arrependerá.

Requisitos:

- Relógio Pebble com atualização de firmware 3.9 ou superior.
- Aparelho Android com aplicativo Tábua de Mares Brasil versão 7.1 ou superior.
- Conexão Bluetooth ativa com o aparelho.

Versão em português. Para inglês, pesquise por “Tide Tables Brazil” (Portuguese version. For english, search for “Tide Tables Brazil").

latest_release.release_notes:
- Novo suporte ao Pebble Time e Pebble Time Steel.
- Condições de ondas e ventos do momento.
- Indicação da altura da maré também através de cor (Time e Time Steel).
- Novo visual mais moderno e bem acabado.
- Exigência de Pebble atualizado para versão 3.9 ou superior.
- Exigência de app para Android versão 7.1 ou superior.

data.title: Tábua de Mares Brasil

data.author: David Cesarino

changelog.release_notes:
- New support for Pebble Time and Pebble Time Steel.
- Waves and winds conditions at the moment.
- Tide height indication by color as well (Time e Time Steel).
- New, more modern and intuitive look.
- Requires Pebble updated to firmware 3.9 or above.
- Requires Android app updated to version 7.1 or above.

English version, supports firmware 2.0.0.

Fixed text layers boundaries when text is taller/wider than the previous boundary.

data.description:
This app allows your Pebble to show updated data of tides, waves and wind conditions for various locations in Brazil, in an effortless and intuitive way, with colors that represent the height of the tide, providing immediate feedback, and following international color standards for weather and oceanic data.

Install now and you won't regret.

Requirements:

- Pebble with firmware update 3.9 or above.
- Android device with app Tide Tables Brazil version 7.1 or above.
- Active Bluetooth connection with device.

Version in english. For portuguese, search for “Tábua de Mares Brasil” (Versão em inglês. Para português, pesquise por “Tábua de Mares Brasil").

latest_release.release_notes:
- New support for Pebble Time and Pebble Time Steel.
- Waves and winds conditions at the moment.
- Tide height indication by color as well (Time e Time Steel).
- New, more modern and intuitive look.
- Requires Pebble updated to firmware 3.9 or above.
- Requires Android app updated to version 7.1 or above.

data.title: Tide Tables Brazil

data.description:
To be able to use this, you'll *need* the Smartwatch+ app available for *jailbroken* iOS devices through Cydia.

The watchface displays:
• Battery status (iPhone/Pebble)
• Time/Date
• Missed calls
• Unread mail
• Unread texts (SMS)
• Weather

Smartwatch+ is available through the BigBoss repository on Cydia.

Thanks to robhh!

latest_release.release_notes: Fixed an issue with the Pebble battery indicator. Thanks o0SLA0o!

data.description:
In cooperation with the original creator Konstantin Pulyarkin alias hop-picker ( http://hop-picker.tumblr.c ), I created a Pebble version of his amazing watch design.

It is so elegant due to simplicity – only one line is needed for quite accurate reading, as we are deeply zoomed in.

Thanks Konstantin for permission to use your work – it was fun to fine-tune this implementation with you!

latest_release.release_notes: Only show welcome screen at first start.

Metro Watch is a awesome new skin watch for all the Pebble family. The big point is the simplicity and minimalism style for an elegant person.
 24h or 12h, you choose. 
Life is clear, clear is Metro Watch.

data.author: Luke Harries
data.description: A digital watch face with a honeycomb pattern. Includes day of the week and date. Customisable with light/dark themes and 12 or 24 hour style.

data.author: John Breen
data.description: This watchface shows the number of seconds since the Unix Epoch (Jan 1, 1970 00:00:00)
data.title: Epoch

data.author: Roger Milne

changelog.release_notes: Another random() update.  This version makes use of the "Tiny Mersenne Twister" algorithm, which is a better quality of random number generator than the current Pebble Firmware (as of v3.3) offers.

Updated the pixel-generation algorithm to account for what appears to be a big change to the Pebbles' Random Number Generator (probably for improving battery life). Firmware v3.3 of the Pebble Time appears to change the RNG algorithm such that Pebble Pixel Art's image generation suddeny started creating highly similar triplets of images. This update compensates by doing some trickery to try to make the values appear to be more random before using them again.

- Upgraded to SDK3 to include native support for Pebble Time and Pebble Steel, as well as original Pebbles.
- Fixed a bug where battery status can be incorrect for a small period of time when the watchface first appears.

data.description: This watch face randomly generates 3 new pixel art images for your enjoyment, across the top of the face, every minute. The randomly generated objects may look like a castle turret, frog, strong man, space invader, guy with headphones and handle-bar mustache, etc. Whatever your mind makes of them. The watch face itself, is based on the 91w demo face, with touched-up pixels.

latest_release.release_notes: Another random() update.  This version makes use of the "Tiny Mersenne Twister" algorithm, which is a better quality of random number generator than the current Pebble Firmware (as of v3.3) offers.

data.title: Pebble Pixel Art

data.author: blankman373
data.description:
This is a simple watchface that calculates the time for the 5 Daily Islamic Prayers, using either your GPS coordinates or a specific location.

Tons of config options, including different calculation methods, time display format and inverting colors.

***Use the settings button in the Pebble app on your phone to configure all the options***
data.title: 5 Daily Prayers

data.author: AtechInnovations

changelog.release_notes:
Fixed a time bug introduced with the watch update. 
Updated the configuration form.
Updated the time display to honor the 24/12 hour setting.

Now in COLOR! 
Configurable to use the Black, Red, and Green Mana as the background.
Battery and bluetooth indicators are also in color.

This updated version includes a change to the minutes display when the time is on the hour. Now instead of 00 which doesn't fit in the box, there is an infinity symbol.
Also this updated includes a visual change to the battery indicator.
Fix for date not showing for some days and months
Updated time font to include space char.

data.description:
Get your wizard on! All the time! Now in COLOR!
Choose between Black, Green, and Red mana colors to fit your mood. 
This watch face will tell you the time, date, give you status on your Bluetooth and battery all while showing off your Magic the Gathering wizard powers.

Fixed a time bug introduced with the watch update. 
Updated the configuration form.
Updated the time display to honor the 24/12 hour setting.

data.author: SetPebble
data.description:
Smile!  Capture an image on your smart phone and send it to your Pebble.  Flick your wrist or chose your refresh rate to switch between images.  Customizable settings.

This high-def version turns some pixels on and off rapidly to gain the appearance of colored pixels.  The displayed image looks terrific, but the battery drains faster.

data.description: This watch ain't nothin' to fuck wit'.

data.author: Pete Hepple
data.description:
Clean, minimal, packed with information.

Battery level is indicated by a simple line running down the left-hand side in 10% increments. Almost invisible head-on, yet clear to read when the Pebble is angled with the left side slightly away from you.

Hacked together from Pranav Vishnu's beautiful Clear Pebble and incorporating modified battery level indicator code from Foxel's Simple F.
data.title: CleanLines

data.author: Eric BERGELIN
data.description:
Plain and obvious sector watch, 
time is displayed by a sector between hour and minute hand.
Polar or pie clock, originally way to wear time.

data.author: Lonsdaleite
data.description:
This watchface shows the time using vibrations.
Just shake your hand and feel current time!
0 - one LONG vibration
1 - one short vibration
2 - two short vibrations
...
9 - nine short vibrations
